This is the wiki page for the paper "Experimentally calibrate population of models
predicts and explains inter-subject variability in cardiac cellular electrophysiology"
by Britton et al.

Model code used in the paper is provided here: https://chaste.cs.ox.ac.uk/trac/browser/projects/PNAS_PopulationOfModels/PurkinjeModel_BrittonEtAl2013.hpp
